snippet: An incident in Boston a day after a fire on another 787 Dreamliner, Boeing’s newest and most sophisticated jet, added to pressure on the aircraft maker’s stock.
abstract: Fuel leak forces Boeing 787 Dreamliner to return to its gate minutes before taking off from Boston, day after an electrical fire broke out on another plane; mishap is the latest incident for the company's newest and most sophisticated jet, adding to pressure on the aircraft maker's stock.
lead_paragraph: An incident in Boston a day after a fire on another 787 Dreamliner, Boeing’s newest and most sophisticated jet, added to pressure on the aircraft maker’s stock.

headline.seo: Fuel Leak Is Latest Setback for Boeing 787 Dreamliner
headline.main: Fuel Leak Is Latest Setback for Boeing’s Dreamliner
headline.print_headline: Fuel Leak Is Latest Setback for Boeing’s Dreamliner
